org.spongepowered.api.event.item.inventory

Interface ClickInventoryEvent.NumberPress

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AffectItemStackEvent, AffectSlotEvent, Cancellable, ChangeInventoryEvent, ClickInventoryEvent, Event, InteractInventoryEvent, TargetContainerEvent, TargetInventoryEvent
    Enclosing interface:
    ClickInventoryEvent

    public static interface ClickInventoryEvent.NumberPress
extends ClickInventoryEvent
    A number press swapping the Hotbar slot with the slot the mouse hovers over.
